SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class TupleCommonGoal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.CommonGoal
it.polimi.ingsw.model.TupleCommonGoal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TupleCommonGoal extends CommonGoal implements Serializable
TupleCommonGoal is a class that represents a generic CommonGoal which is satisfied if the BookShelf contains a given number of groups of adjacent tiles of the same type on a bookshelf.
Since:
21/04/2023
Version:
3.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

    • rule

      public List<EntryPatternGoal> rule(TileType[][] bookShelf)
      Description copied from class: CommonGoal

      The method returns null if the CommonGoal is not satisfied for the bookShelf argument.

      If the common goal is satisfied then the method returns a list of the EntryPatternGoals representing the tiles in the BookShelf that satisfy the CommonGoal.

      Specified by:
      rule in class CommonGoal
      Parameters:
      bookShelf - the bookshelf to be checked
      Returns:
      the list of EntryPatternGoal that allow a match with the CommonGoal
